inclusion.criterion: Adult individual 18 years of age or older
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Cognitively intact and capable of giving informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Clinical diagnosis of Traumatic Spinal Cord Injury
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Subject has mesenchymal stem cells banked at Hope Biosciences
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: The patient accepts to receive treatment and to comply with follow-up visits
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Clinically significant, uncontrolled cardiovascular, lung, renal, hepatic, or endocrine disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Participation in concurrent interventional research studies during this study
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Severe organ failure (heart, kidney or liver), confirmed by additional tests or medical history
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Unwillingness to return for follow-up visits
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has Parkinson's disease, but no clinical diagnosis of Traumatic Spinal Cord Injury. He is on medication and reports improvement in symptoms.
